definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Both Liujiaxia and Heishanxia reservoirs can meet the requirements of ice prevention.
sentences.chinese: 刘家峡水库或黑山峡水库均能满足防凌要求。

sentences.english: Aimdst Three Gorges is Ahvu' s early representative works.
sentences.chinese: 《山峡中》是艾芜早期小说的代表作。

sentences.english: Cape becomes bar, and plain shoal, and valley and gorge deep water and channel.
sentences.chinese: 岬角成了沙洲和浅滩，溪谷和山峡成了深水与湖峡。

sentences.english: Canyon in Mountains is Aiwu's early representative work.
sentences.chinese: 《山峡中》是艾芜早期小说的代表作。

sentences.english: A deep mountainside gorge or gully, especially in the Swiss Alps.
sentences.chinese: 岬角成了沙洲和浅滩，溪谷和山峡成了深水与湖峡。

definition: Wuxia Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the middle of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Xiling Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the lower of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River

Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
the peaks of a mountain range
